title: Champagne Charlie 1944  B/W
description:
Champagne Charlie (1944) 

  72 min   -  Comedy | Drama | Musical  -  6 August 1948 (USA)   


6.8 

Your rating: 
    















The story of a 19th century English music hall (vaudeville) performer and life behind the scenes.


Director: Alberto Cavalcanti (as Cavalcanti)

This I believe is one of the best films Tommy Trinder ever made.

It shows the musical hall acts of the late Thirties and Forties.
Stanley Holloway is at his best.   Enjoy and seed please.
